author: dimvar
message:
PR #30514: Rename sm_101 to sm_110. Naming change for Thor; takes effect on CUDA 13 onward.

Imported from GitHub PR https://github.com/openxla/xla/pull/30514

sm_101 is the SM number for Thor prior to CUDA 13. It will be effectively unused. XLA can support Thor only on CUDA 13 onward.
Copybara import of the project:

--
71eaae629356dfee6460fdfdaae54326a51658a6 by Dimitris Vardoulakis <dvardoulakis@nvidia.com>:

Rename sm_101 to sm_110. Naming change for Thor; takes effect on CUDA 13 onward.

Merging this change closes #30514
